      • calcVMG

        public static double calcVMG(double btm,
             double cog,
             double sog)
        Method to compute the Velocity Made Good (VMG) toward the current active mark.
        Parameters:
        btm - - Bearing-To-Mark
        cog - - Course-Over-Ground (both -btm & cog- assumed to be True North)
        sog - - Speed-Over-Ground
        Returns:
        double vmg

      • calcVMGu

        public static double calcVMGu(double twa,
              double CourseOffset,
              double sog)
        Method to compute the Velocity Made Good Upwind (VMGu) toward the current active mark. This is the preferred VMG calc since it measures your upwind progress and avoids the disadvantage of the conventional VMG that declines as you approach the mark layline. (because the angle to the mark approaches 90 as you approach the layline, at which point vmg=0).
        Parameters:
        twa - - True Wind Angle
        CourseOffset - - 0.0 for Upwind legs, 180.0 for Downwind legs
        sog - - Speed-Over-Ground
        Returns:
        double vmgu as a percentage of the SOG

      • optimumLaylines

        public static double[] optimumLaylines(double boatLat,
                       double boatLon,
                       double markerLat,
                       double markerLon,
                       double TWD,
                       double TackAngle,
                       java.lang.String tack)
        Method to compute the optimum Laylines from current boat location to a mark returns the waypoint at which to tack to sail the course Boat->Tack->Mark. check drawing in Evernote "SailingRace App - Android" - angle BTM renamed to Stbd
        Parameters:
        boatLat -
        boatLon -
        markerLat -
        markerLon -
        TWD - - True Wind Direction (True North)
        TackAngle - - optimum Upwind / Downwind Tack or Gybe angle
        tack - - current tack (stbd or port)
        Returns:
        double[] array with [Latitude, Longitude, initial tack (0=stbd) (1=port), Direction]

        Method to compute Distance (in nm) and Bearing (in degrees) to current active mark using the Great Circle calculations.
        Parameters:
        latFrom -
        lonFrom -
        latTo -
        lonTo -
        Returns:
        double[] array with [Distance, Bearing] from boat to mark

        public static double[] withDistanceBearingToPosition(double latFrom,
                                     double lonFrom,
                                     double distance,
                                     double bearing)
        Method to compute the latitude and longitude when moving a set Distance (in nm) and Bearing (in degrees) from a given location (latFrom, lonFrom)
        Parameters:
        latFrom -
        lonFrom -
        distance - (in nm)
        bearing - (in True North)
        Returns:
        double[] array values = [Latitude, Longitude]

      • polars

        public double[] polars(double TWS)
        Compute the Capri 25 polars. See Excel file "Capri25_Polars.xlxs" for the details. Method returns the upwind VMG and optimum Tack Angle for each input True Wind Speed (TWS).
        Parameters:
        TWS - - double with the True Wind Speed
